content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you find the apartment to your liking. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm sure we can find a price that suits both our needs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Mr. Abbasi. I am aware that the apartment is in the city center and is newly built. Therefore, I think a price of 650 Euro per month is very reasonable. This includes the internet and electricity.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I see, Mr. Abbasi. Well, I am a fair and reasonable landlord, but 650 Euro per month is too low for such a prime location and the modern amenities of this apartment. I am willing to negotiate, but I am sure you understand the value of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Mr. Abbasi. How about 680 Euro per month? I think this is a fair price for both of us.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Abbasi. However, 680 Euro per month is still not enough for the quality of the apartment. I am willing to be flexible, but I think a price closer to 750 Euro per month would be more in line with the value of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mr. Abbasi. However, 750 Euro per month is too high for me. How about 720 Euro per month? I think this is a fair and reasonable price for both of us.
